Here are the extracted sentences that meet the criteria:

The survival values plotted on the Y-axis were normalized based on the survival achieved at 10 μM Y-27632 (taken to be 100%).
Four replicates were tested for each concentration and the data were normalized with respect to the average CellTiter Glow™ (CTG) reading obtained from 10 μM Y-27632 
FIG. 6 is a line plot illustrating half maximal inhibitory concentration (IC50) of Y-27632 determined in kinase assays against ROCK1 and ROCK2 using the HotSpot Kinase Assay performed by Reaction Biology Corporation (Malvern, Pa.).
FIG. 7 is a line plot illustrating the half maximal inhibitory concentration (IC50) of Chroman 1 determined in kinase assays against ROCK1 and ROCK2 using the HotSpot Kinase Assay performed by Reaction Biology Corporation (Malvern, Pa.).
FIG. 8 is a table summarizing the inhibitory activity of 10 μM Y-27632 and 50 nM Chroman 1.
Whole-well images (6-well plate) were captured with calcein green (0.5 μg/mL; obtained from Thermo Fisher Scientific).
